definitions: The ramifications of a decision, plan, or event are all its consequences and effects, especially ones which are not obvious at first.
the act or process of ramifying or branching out
a subsidiary consequence, esp one that complicates
a ramifying or being ramified; specif., the arrangement of branches or offshoots, as on a plant
a derived effect, consequence, or result
the act or process of ramifying
a related or derived subject, problem, etc.; outgrowth; consequence; implication
